t: Deer Brand - Schell’s Brewery - Untappd
s: A straw-colored classic, our Deer Brand beer is an American lager developed from over a century and a half of continuous brewing history. This Pre-prohibition lager has a mild malt flavor, hop bitterness, and uses our special strain of “Schell” yeast to make it an upper Midwest favorite.
